trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de eventos são utilizados como um objeto de parâmetro no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"> </xref> eventos da raiz <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe está exposta como o `e` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento é desencadeado antes de apresentar a uma nova vista, como resultado o utilizador final clicando e arrastando numa área de gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>evento é desencadeado depois da nova vista é criada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: É importante ter em atenção que não não possível definir a posição e tamanho de uma vista <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>eventos porque neste caso, a vista já está criada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ViewEventArgs contém as seguintes propriedades: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objeto que está a ser apresentada a vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>propriedade obtém o nome da área de gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível definir outras propriedades da área de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto a que a vista está associada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo de eixo, que pode ser X, Y, X2 ou Y2, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível definir outras propriedades do eixo.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>propriedade, o que representa a nova posição de uma vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade, o que representa o novo tamanho de uma vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>propriedade, o que representa a unidade de medida para o tamanho de uma vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe com especificado axis e newPosition parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: O eixo da vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial da vista de escala de novo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe com especificado axis , newPosition , newSize e newSizeType parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: O eixo da vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial da vista de escala de novo.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: O novo tamanho de vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A unidade de medida para o tamanho da vista de escala de novo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que pertence uma vista.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada para:-determinam o tipo de eixo-X, X2, Y ou Y2 — que o evento está a ser gerado, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Obter e definir as propriedades do eixo, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que representa o eixo que uma vista pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto que pertence uma vista.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade pode ser utilizada para determinar a área de gráfico a que pertence a vista, acedendo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade também pode ser utilizada para obter e definir as propriedades da área de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto que representa a área de gráfico numa vista pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a nova posição de uma vista ao longo de um eixo.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>de objeto e representa a nova posição de uma vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de NewPosition pode ser definida para um novo valor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos, mas não é possível definir um novo valor para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>eventos porque neste caso, a vista já está criada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: O NewPosition é sempre medido como um valor de eixo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição de uma vista ao longo de um eixo, que é o parte inferior de uma vista vertical ou a posição à esquerda de uma vista horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho de uma vista ao longo de um eixo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o tamanho de uma vista ao longo de um eixo.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho é o a altura da vista vertical ou a largura da vista horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a unidade de medida para o novo tamanho de uma vista.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, a unidade de medida para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade automaticamente é determinada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlar e deixará de ser um número ou um dia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Recuperar que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade é sempre medida como um valor de eixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que se definir explicitamente o tipo de tamanho, o tipo corresponde do eixo, que pertence a barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, não especifique <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>se não utilizar o eixo <xref:System.DateTime>valores.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade pode ser definida para um novo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento, mas não é possível definir um novo valor para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>eventos porque a vista já está a ser criada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que representa a unidade de medida para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>propriedade, o que representa a largura ou altura de uma vista de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.
